verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Alleluja, Alleluja
Jesus is the Lord
He's the Lord of all my heart (x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's the Way
He's the Truth
He's the Life

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alleluja, Alleluja
Jesus, You're the Lord
You're the Lord of all my heart (x2)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You're the Way
You're the Truth
You're the Life
